question: Mufti sahab Assalamu-alaikum. I had a dream that I wish if you could interpret for me.
answer:
QUESTION
When I was approximately 13 years of age, I am currently 23, I had a dream in which I was crossing a wooden bridge. In my dream I had knowledge that this was pul-siraat. As I was crossing the bridge going over the hellfire, the bottom gave out from underneath me and I barely hung on before I awoke. I have been too ashamed to ever ask anyone to interpret this dream, if you could please tell me its meaning. Jazakhallahu khair.
ANSWER


Share:
The dream indicates that you will be saved from the fire of Jahannum (hell)
if you obey the orders of Allah Ta'ala and the Sunnah of Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
